text: visvasulaku (muslinlaku), daivapravakta svayanga tama kante kuda mukhyudu. Mariyu atani bharyalu variki tallulu. Allah grantham prakaram raktasambandhikulu - itara visvasula mariyu valasa vaccina vari (muhajirin) kante - okari kokaru ekkuvaga paraspara sambandham (hakkulu) galavaru. Kani! Miru mi snehitulaku melu ceyagorite (adi vere visayam)! Vastavaniki idanta granthanlo vrayabadi vundi
